name: I Must Return - LD32 Edition
description:
Here is my Ludum Dare 32 entry! The theme was "An Unconventional Weapon".

Fight aliens while trying to restore power to Negative Zones so that you can teleport back to your ship! Weapons include: bricks, bubbles, ice cream, and dirty socks!

Here is the link to the game on the Ludum Dare website
